name: CATS Job Listings
author: catssoft (dev@catsone.com)

sections.description:
Plugin to pull your job listings from the CATS Applicant Tracking System and display them on your WordPress site by using a shortcode.

You will need to have an account on catsone.com in order to use this plugin.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/cats-job-listings directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings > CATS Job Listings screen to configure the plugin
  4. Use the shortcode [catsone] on any page you’d like your jobs displayed.
sections.faq:
Do I need to have a CATS account to use this?

Yes, an account at catsone.com is required to use this plugin.

What version of PHP do I need?

The plugin will work with PHP 5.3+. Older versions of PHP have not been supported for some time and contain security risks. We always recommend upgrading to the latest version of PHP when possible.

short_description: Add your open jobs to any page on your site. Works with the CATS Applicant Tracking System.
description:
Plugin to pull your job listings from the CATS Applicant Tracking System and display them on your WordPress site by using a shortcode.

You will need to have an account on catsone.com in order to use this plugin.

upgrade_notice.1.0.1: Added support for older versions of PHP

screenshots.caption: Setup the plugin by entering your unique subdomain, domain and optionally a portal ID. This tells the plugin which listings to render.
Once done in settings, add the [catsone] shortcode to any page you’d like your listings to appear.
An example of what your listings will look like. Use CSS to customize the display.
